Class EndTurnHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Handler
      • controller.EndTurnHandler

  • public class EndTurnHandler
extends Handler
    The Controller/Handler to end the turn of a player
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere, Vincent Reniers and Stefan Pante
